blocks.name: ceqlg
blocks.content: Declare the class of equilateral triangles.

blocks.name: df-eqlg
blocks.content: Define the class of equilateral triangles. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Nov-2019.)

blocks.name: iseqlg
blocks.content: Property of a triangle being equilateral. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm iseqlg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ceqlg, c3)), wbr(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(c1, c2, c0))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cds, c3))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(citv, c3))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(clng, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ceqlg, c3)), wbr(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(c1, c2, c0)))), wceq(c5, cfv(cds, c3)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ceqlg, c3)), wbr(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(c1, c2, c0)))), wceq(c6, cfv(citv, c3)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ceqlg, c3)), wbr(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(c1, c2, c0)))), wceq(c7, cfv(clng, c3)))
  3bitrd(w0, wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ceqlg, c3)), wbr(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), crab(hs0, co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat2), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0))))), wa(wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3))), wbr(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat1), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat2), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat0)))))
  eleq2d(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ceqlg, c3), crab(hs0, co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat2), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0)))), w0)
  3syl(w0, wceq(cfv(ceqlg, c3), crab(hs0, co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat2), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0))))), wcel(c3, cstrkg), wcel(c3, universe))
  elex(c3, cstrkg)
  fvmpt(hs1, c3, universe, ceqlg, crab(hs0, co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat2), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0)))), crab(hs0, co(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(ccgrg, cv(hs1)), cs3(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat2), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0)))))
  rabeqbidv(hs0, co(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(ccgrg, cv(hs1)), cs3(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat2), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat2), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0))))
  oveq1d(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3), c4, wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), c4, cfv(cbs, c3), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c3, cbs)
  breqd(cv(hs0), cfv(ccgrg, cv(hs1)), cs3(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat2), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0)), cfv(ccgrg, c3), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c3, ccgrg)
  df-eqlg(hs1, hs0)
  rabex(hs0, co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat2), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0))))
  ovex(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3))
  a1i(w0, wb(wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), crab(hs0, co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat2), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0))))), wa(wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3))), wbr(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat1), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat2), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat0))))))
  elrab(hs0, cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat2), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0))), wbr(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat1), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat2), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat0))))
  breq12d(cv(hs0), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat2), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0)), cs3(c0, c1, c2), cs3(cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat1), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat2), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cs3(c0, c1, c2)))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cs3(c0, c1, c2)))
  s3eqd(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat2), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat1), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat2), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), cs3(c0, c1, c2)))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat1)
  fveq1(cv(hs0), cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat2)
  fveq1(cv(hs0), cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat0)
  bitr3d(w0, wa(wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3))), wbr(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat1), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat2), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat0)))), wbr(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(c1, c2, c0)), wbr(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat1), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat2), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat0))))
  biantrurd(w0, wbr(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat1), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat2), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat0))), wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3))))
  sylanblc(w0, wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3))), wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cword(c4)), wceq(cfv(chash, cs3(c0, c1, c2)), nat3))
  s3cld(c0, c1, c2, c4, w0)
  s3len(c0, c1, c2)
  mp2an(wb(wa(wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cword(c4)), wceq(cfv(chash, cs3(c0, c1, c2)), nat3)), wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)))), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(nat3, cn0))
  fvexi(c4, cbs, c3)
  3nn0()
  wrdmap(c4, universe, nat3, cs3(c0, c1, c2))
  breq2d(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat1), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat2), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat0)), cs3(c1, c2, c0), w0)
  s3eqd(cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat1), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat2), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat0), c1, c2, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat1), c1), wcel(c1, c4))
  s3fv1(c1, c4, c0, c2)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat2), c2), wcel(c2, c4))
  s3fv2(c2, c4, c0, c1)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat0), c0), wcel(c0, c4))
  s3fv0(c0, c4, c1, c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat2), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c4, cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cs3(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat1), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat2), cfv(cs3(c0, c1, c2), nat0))))
}

blocks.name: iseqlgd
blocks.content: Condition for a triangle to be equilateral. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm iseqlgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ceqlg, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cds, c3))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(citv, c3))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(clng, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c5, c1), co(c1, c5, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c1, c5, c2), co(c2, c5, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, c5, c0), co(c0, c5, c1)))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ceqlg, c3)), wbr(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cfv(ccgrg, c3), cs3(c1, c2, c0)))
  trgcgr(c0, c1, c2, cfv(ccgrg, c3), c1, c2, c0, c4, c3, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccgrg, c3))
  iseqlg(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iseqlgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí <" c0 . c1 . c2 "> ‚àà(eqltrG ` c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(dist ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Itv ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(LineG ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà TarskiG)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c5]c1)=(c1[c5]c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1[c5]c2)=(c2[c5]c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c2[c5]c0)=(c0[c5]c1))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, <" c0 . c1 . c2 "> ‚àà(eqltrG ` c3), <" c0 . c1 . c2 ">[(cgrG ` c3)]<" c1 . c2 . c0 ">)
  trgcgr(c0, c1, c2, (cgrG ` c3), c1, c2, c0, c4, c3, c5, w0)
  eqid((cgrG ` c3))
  iseqlg(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
}
